title: Can an omnipotent being through their omnipotence make themselves omniscience? - Quora

response.answer_text: The answer to the question is almost too obvious. When you define a being as omnipotent, you make the answer “yes” automatically. Omnipotent = having all power. Having all power = able to do anything. Hence: Can “a being who can do anything” ... make itself omniscient (all-knowing)? Obviously, yes. Can “a being who can do anything ... do X? (or Y? or Z?). Obviously, yes, no matter what X, Y or Z might be. Most religions believe that the Supreme Being (God) is both omnipotent and omniscient (all-knowing).
The God is the ONLY Omnipotent and The Only Omniscience Abu Salam's post in Islam The Only Truth
